name: Hide N'See
description:
Hide N'See
  • A game of tag

In Hide N'See you play randomly a villager or a wolf, the goal of the wolf is to touch the villager to give him his role, and the last one being the villager at the end of a 2 minutes timer wins. (This game was made by 5 second year students from e-artsup Strasbourg in 5 days.)

  • But there is a little twist

Indeed Hide N'See is not just a normal game of tag, you can't see each other so you can only rely on two things, the sound of your heartbeats getting stronger as someone approaches and the particles players leave behind them.

  • Controls

Use the arrow keys and left clic for player 1 and a PS5 controller for player 2
